content: discover the serene reflections hat pattern a fully reversible crochet project offering two stylish looks in one perfect for gifts available in multiple sizes > grab your free hat pattern from my > website or purchase the ad-free pdf > right here on ravelry get the matching scarf pattern that uses the same yarn here 1 this is just one of the patterns included in our august hat of the month club collection subscribe to receive a notification when or club patterns are available each month https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d 2 > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until august 26 > 2024 at 11 59 pm est new york time > 23 59 for cal participants simply > add the pattern to your cart before > 11 59 pm est on august 26th and it > will show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on august 25 2024 at 8 00 pm est new york time 20 00 > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol 1 https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/serene-reflections-scarf-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d
